summary: A young woman is forced to return to her childhood home after being placed under house arrest, where she suspects that something evil may be lurking.
cast: Morgana O'Reilly|Rima Te Wiata|Glen-Paul Waru|Ross Harper|Cameron Rhodes|Ryan Lampp|Mick Innes|Bruce Hopkins|Millen Baird|Wallace Chapman|David Van Horn|Nikki Si'ulepa|Ian Mune|Kitty Riddell|Lila Sharp|Andrew Dickens|Louise Mills
keywords: slapstick comedy|low budget film|female protagonist|grindhouse film|exploding head
title: Housebound
